summary: Comprehensive testing of TaskAct platform features: Company badge removal, dark theme for super admin, tenant deactivate/reactivate/delete functionality. All 8 requested features verified and working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Navigation.js correctly removes company badge - no badge element exists for any user
Dark theme properly applied to super admin: Navigation (slate-800, rgb(30,41,59)), Main app (slate-900, rgb(15,23,42)), Dashboard cards, Admin Panel
Light theme correctly applies for regular tenant users: Navigation (white, rgb(255,255,255)), Main app (gray-50, rgb(249,250,251))
AdminPanel.js properly implements tenant actions dropdown with Deactivate, Reactivate, Delete Permanently options
TASKACT1 tenant correctly protected - no Delete Permanently option shown in dropdown
Backend tenants.py properly implements /api/tenants/{id} DELETE for deactivation, PUT /reactivate for reactivation, DELETE /permanent for permanent deletion
seed_data_creation: Test tenants created and deleted during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 8 features tested and verified: 1) Company badge removed from nav for all users, 2) Super admin sees dark theme (slate-800/900 backgrounds), 3) Regular users see light theme (white/gray-50 backgrounds), 4) Admin Panel has Deactivate option in dropdown, 5) Admin Panel has Delete Permanently option, 6) Deactivating tenant works, 7) Reactivating tenant works, 8) TASKACT1 tenant protected from deletion

company_badge_removed.details: No company badge visible in navigation for either super admin or regular tenant users

super_admin_dark_theme.details: Super admin login shows dark theme: Navigation bg=rgb(30,41,59), Main app bg=rgb(15,23,42)

regular_user_light_theme.details: Regular tenant user (SCO1) sees light theme: Navigation bg=rgb(255,255,255), Main app bg=rgb(249,250,251)

admin_panel_deactivate_option.details: Deactivate option visible in tenant actions dropdown

admin_panel_delete_option.details: Delete Permanently option visible in tenant actions dropdown (except TASKACT1)

deactivate_tenant_functionality.details: API DELETE /api/tenants/{id} successfully deactivates tenant (sets active=false)

reactivate_tenant_functionality.details: API PUT /api/tenants/{id}/reactivate successfully reactivates tenant (sets active=true)

taskact1_protection.details: TASKACT1 tenant dropdown shows only Edit Details and Deactivate, no Delete Permanently option

tests_run: Super Admin login and dark theme verification
Admin Panel navigation and dark theme
Regular tenant user login and light theme
Admin Panel NOT accessible for regular user
Create tenant, deactivate, reactivate, delete flow (UI)
